title.narrative: Emerald Sri Lanka Fund I Limited

description.narrative: Development of private equity industry: The Fund is expected to be the first private equity fund dedicated to investing in Sri Lanka and will pave the way for development of the private equity asset class in the country and encourage flow of private capital into financing growth of small and mid-sized private companies. Private Sector Development: The Fund is expected to promote sustainable growth in companies that do not have access to other sources of capital. The Fund will add value to portfolio companies through capacity building, improved corporate governance, and providing operational expertise. Access to Finance to MSMEs: The Fund will provide capital to capital strained MSMEs. Job Creation: Supporting high growth MSMEs in the growth phase leads to substantial job creation, at a greater rate than the national average.

The proposed project is an investment in Emerald Sri Lanka Fund I Limited (Fund), a private equity fund which aims to invest in small and mid-sized businesses seeking growth or expansion capital in Sri Lanka. The Fund will take significant minority stakes in 10-12 well run companies. The Fund will add value by providing support and expertise on capital structures, financial reporting, business development, management development, corporate governance, strategy etc. to the portfolio companies.
